title: Nosy Karen
desc:
Post 18
***Gossip** (Passive, Triggered when you score above 50%)*
You may request Hello Neighbors with two players.
***Peer Through Window** (Charge 60%)*
Use during the evening phase to learn who your target has Hello Neighbors with.
***PTA Politics***
Target one (1) player who did NOT vote with the winning majority during the previous day phase, and one (1) player with whom you have a Hello Neighbor. Learn if they can win together.
***Talkative** (passive)*
Randomly roleblock one of your visitors each night.
